message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing opportunity to purchase this incredible product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to make a one-time offer of $1100000. This is a great deal, and I think you won't find a better price anywhere else.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $950000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this offer.

I understand you're looking for a fair price, but I'm not willing to go as low as $950000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and make a counteroffer of $1025000. This is a great compromise, and I think you'll find it's a very reasonable price for this incredible product.

I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still not comfortable going above $1000000. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $990000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the price I'm willing to pay. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this offer.

I can see you're still a bit below your target, and I'm willing to make another compromise. I'll meet you at $995000, which is just $5000 below my minimum price. I think this is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. Let me know if this works for you.

I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my target. I'm willing to make a counteroffer of $980000. I think this is a fair price considering the market value of the product and the price I'm willing to pay. I'd love to hear your thoughts on this offer.
